key_risks: Environmental and regulatory challenges, including the Mexico dispute and ongoing compliance issues
Market and economic volatility due to cyclical construction industry and reliance on government infrastructure spending
Community opposition and ethical concerns, including local resistance to quarry expansions and customer complaints
controversies: Legal and environmental dispute with the Mexican government over limestone quarrying operations
BBB complaints related to service delivery and operational reliability
environmental_issues: Environmental harm allegations in Mexico and air quality violations in the Bay Area
Community concerns over environmental impacts of quarry expansions
social_issues: Growing community resistance to quarry expansions, impacting local quality of life
Customer complaints regarding service delivery and operational reliability
governance_issues: Persistent environmental compliance challenges and significant penalties for violations
Integration risks associated with strategic acquisitions
